Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Western
ShortDescription: 78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose due to a street blockage near Montrose/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#78 Montrose buses are temporarily rerouted via Montrose, Western, Irving Park, California and Montrose due to a street blockage near Montrose/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Reroute at Cortland/Ashland
ShortDescription: 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Elston and Cortland due to, street blockage near Cortland/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Armitage, Elston and Cortland due to, street blockage near Cortland/Ashland.

Allow extra travel time.
